Something probably went wrong with the auto generation during the most
rece=
nt build. I'm sure Michael will fix it once he gets in.
 
In the meantime y=
ou can use the PDF version which is available at
http://crawler.archive.org=
/articles/user_manual.pdf
It's not quite as pretty, but has the same conten=
t. However I don't think
you will find what you are looking for there. As I=
 recall the
ContextTypeRegExp is a fairly recent (and advanced) addition an=
d is simply
outside the manual's scope. Maybe Michael (or someone) will ame=
nd that as
well :)
 
- Kris
